item.title: 日本語勉強 - Personal recommendations for Japanese learners
item.description: This is a list of resources that is working well for my Japanese studies.

item.title: Unit testing a static custom logger in Spring Boot and log4j2
item.description: Last time I wrote a post about how to unit test a custom logger with log4j2.

item.title: Debug a Java Spring Boot application in Docker from IntelliJ
item.description: You have a Java Spring Boot application built with Gradle in a Docker container and you need to debug it from your favorite IDE on your host machine (IntelliJ).

item.title: Create modules in Jupyter notebooks
item.description: In my current attempt to improve the development experience of my team, I am trying to introduce Jupyter notebooks to share knowledge about some data analysis scripts developed over the last years.

item.title: Improving the development experience: Jupyter for Elasticsearch
item.description: I have been asked to extract data from Elasticsearch and I had no clue of what kind of data were stored inside of it.

item.title: My current learning journey
item.description: I started my journey at Rakuten in June 2017 and, more precisely, I am Full Stack Engineer working for Rakuten Magazine.

item.title: Changing Everything. Again.
item.description: After 7 years spent in France I am officially moving to Tokyo, Japan, end of May 2017.

item.title: Back from SoCraTes France 2016
item.description: My second time in a Software Craftsmanship and Testing (SoCraTes) conference and, as always, it has been an awesome experience.

item.title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2016, Sophia Antipolis, France
Dependency Injection VS Extract and Override Factory Method
item.description: The TextConverter exercise (in the Racing Car kata suite) is a very interesting exercise for refactoring legacy code.

item.title: A Community of Professionals - SoCraTes UK
item.description: A couple of weeks ago I participated for the first time to a SoCraTes event, one of the Software Craftsmanship international gatherings.
